name: implement_pattern_recognition_and_synapse_adjustments
description: Enhances AI capabilities by implementing pattern recognition and synapse adjustments to improve learning from data inputs.

data_type.description: Specifies the type of data the AI will analyze and learn from.

learning_rate.description: Defines the learning rate for synapse adjustments, influencing how quickly the AI adapts to new patterns.

pattern_complexity.description: Determines the complexity level of the patterns the AI will attempt to recognize and learn.

adjustment_iterations.description: Specifies the number of iterations the AI should perform for synapse adjustments during the learning process.
